commentary: And in addition to helping dispel the "mystery" for us, and beginning to dispel the shame for Karkat, Jack is initiating an almost heartwarming moment of bonding between them. He quickly establishes himself to Karkat as an amalgam of a pseudo-father figure, a tamed dangerous animal, and now a blood brother. Jack is the first  person Karkat ever meets who has blood like his, but soon he will meet a lot more. Humans sharing his blood type is another small symbolic way of hinting that Karkat is more fundamentally suited to being a human than being a troll, struggle as he might against this truth for most of his life.
